Description: The subject matter of the content.

The identifier property represents any kind of identifier for any kind of Thing, such as ISBNs, GTIN codes, UUIDs etc. Schema.org provides dedicated properties for representing many of these, either as textual strings or as URL (URI) links.
The frequency with which items are added to a collection.
A license document that applies to this content, typically indicated by URL.
The language of the content or performance or used in an action
The date on which the CreativeWork was most recently modified or when the item's entry was modified within a DataFeed.
Livestock species that are reported in the content.
Subject matter to which the content pertains.

The temporalCoverage of a CreativeWork indicates the period that the content applies to, i.e. that it describes, either as a DateTime or as a textual string indicating a time period in ISO 8601 time interval format.
The spatialCoverage of a CreativeWork indicates the place(s) which are the focus of the content.
